meaningMnemonic: Below this <radical>mountain</radical>, a <radical>moon</radical> and another <radical>moon</radical> crash into each other and the entire thing <kanji>crumble</kanji>s to pieces.
readingMnemonic: As the mountain <kanji>crumble</kanji>s you see your <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう), which is at the very top of the mountain, come crumbling down too.
